sentences.sentence: The European Commission sends another shipment of 45 tons of medicines and nutritional packages to people in the Gaza Strip.

sentences.sentence: Charles III and Queen Camilla have presided over the state opening of Parliament with the first King's speech since 1951.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: While waiting for an agreement on some sort of pause in military operations in the Gaza Strip, the European Commission is coordinating the shipment of another 45 tons of medicines and nutritional packages.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Le cargo transporté par un avion égyptien le dimanche, va de l'aéroport d'Ostenda en Belgique à Al-Arish en Égypte, près de la pointe de croissance de Rafa, vers Gaza. The idea is to create a coordinated flow of products to Gaza and not to flood the logistics spaces with products that would not yet be required.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Although the quantities are only a small fraction of what's needed for the 2.2 million people under siege, food, water and medicine are still allowed into Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But the Israeli government maintains a strict ban on fuel supplies, which is exacerbating the humanitarian emergency.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: VLADIMIR PUTIN, President, United Nations Development Council of the United States of Europe, Fuel is needed in order to power generators, to run hospitals, to run to operate the water pumps and desalination plants, to run bakeries, and not least to enable humanitarian workers to move around and provide the supplies to people who need it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: So this is the picture.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: We will continue to work on the improving of access.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: We will continue to impress on all the parties to introduce the necessary arrangements.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: You call it humanitarian windows, pauses or cease-fires.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On Monday, the U.N. Security Council once again failed to agree on a resolution suspending military operations, with the U.S. calling for humanitarian pauses and many others demanding a humanitarian ceasefire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Until that happens, the U.N. agencies and other humanitarian aid organizations also stress the need to open the two border crossings from the Israeli side, because so far help has not reached the north of Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: They need access to humanitarian assistance as much as in the south.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And with a blockade on fuel, this is a major challenge of whether or not the trucks can move from the south to the north.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This is why unhindered, continuous flow of assistance is the most critical here, because we're not talking about just past the border we're talking all the way through Gaza. The flight from Ostend and another that left a day from Dubai brings the number of EU humanitarian air bridge flights to eight. European Commission says this ends the first phase of help with the second one starting in a few weeks' time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Jordan's King Abdullah II has taken his campaign for a ceasefire in Gaza to Brussels. EU leaders

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: have called for corridors and pauses to allow humanitarian aid into the besieged territory, but have so far stopped short of supporting a ceasefire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Their discussions instead focused on preventing Israel's war with Hamas from crossing borders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Jordan plays a key stabilising role in the region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The Commission announced a support package for the country worth 902 million euros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The King also held meetings with NATO officials. The organization is divided over the Middle Eastern conflict, with Turkey condemning Israel's military campaign in Gaza and the U.S. broadly supporting it. A meeting of G7 ministers in Japan has further exposed divisions between the Western members. France was the only country to vote in favor of a UN General Assembly resolution last month seeking an immediate humanitarian truce. Outside the meeting in Tokyo, hundreds of protesters called for a ceasefire. They described the war in Gaza as a massacre.

sentences.sentence: Geolocated footage from the 4th of November confirms that Ukrainian forces hit the Russian Askal missile carrier, a Krakow-class corvette that the Russian Black Sea fleet launched in 2021 at the Zaliv shipyard in Kerch, east of Crimea. After a series of Ukrainian attacks in September, Russia has been relocating some naval ships from the main base in Sevastopol in the next Crimea, further east to Novorossiysk, there it is, in Russian Krasnodar region, and to another location in southeastern Crimea to Feodosia, there it is. The two ports are on both sides of the Kerch Strait connecting eastern annexed Crimea with the Russian mainland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The prospective centres will accommodate up to 3,000 people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Those allocated to Albania will be rescued at sea by Italian boats, however the plan excludes pregnant women, children and vulnerable individuals.

sentences.sentence: Italy's far-right Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni, dice che l'iniziativa aiuterà a rilassare la cronica di incontro nei centri di processamento di asilo in Italia, dove negli ultimi anni centinaia di migranti hanno iniziato a fare voci a terra rischia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Critici del plan hanno accusato Meloni di creare un of creating an Italian Guantanamo outside of the EU without the possibility of monitoring the detention status of the people locked up.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: This comes as the UK government is challenged in the courts over its plan to send asylum seekers to hotel-like accommodation in Rwanda.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Under the British plan, people regarded as illegal immigrants or asylum seekers will be relocated to the African country for processing. Those who are successful in claiming asylum will have to remain in Rwanda.

sentences.sentence: The state opening of Parliament is a display of pomp, but the real power lies behind the throne.
